resources.string: Optional long description of the broadcast. %1$s is available. Length must be less than %2$s characters.

string.name: sourceUrlOrGameIds
string.comment:
sourceUrlOrGameIds
In the "New live broadcast" form, a field for specifying the game(s). Description:
URL that Lichess will check to get PGN updates. It must be publicly accessible from the Internet. Alternatively, you can enter up to 64 Lichess game IDs, separated by spaces.

resources.string: URL that Lichess will check to get PGN updates. It must be publicly accessible from the Internet.
Alternatively, you can enter up to 64 Lichess game IDs, separated by spaces.
Start date in your own timezone
Optional, if you know when the event starts
